title: MrMojoRising26
author: MrMojoRising26
created_time: October 02, 2023, 02:03:11 PMLast edit: October 06, 2023, 12:08:01 AM by MrMojoRising26
content: Up for auction is 4 lots serial numbers 10,11,12,13.¬†I have increased the amount I have been making from 10 to 13 so more are available to others. The coins are 50mm diameter stainless steel. 13 coins were made #1-9 are reserved. The character on the front of the coin is the crimson ghost from old 1940s movies, and later used by the punk rock band (the misfits) I just added my own touch to it. I will do some stuff like this from time to time I know it is not something everyone might like, but I am here to have fun making coins so that is what I am gonna do. Lots of misfits references on the coin ¬†Each coin is funded with 0.00138 BTC ¬†STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.00138 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0002 BTCEND TIME: October 5th, 2023, 15:00:00 PDT**PAYMENT DUE 24 HOURS AFTER AUCTION ENDS**PAYMENT ADDRESS: 3Q6xqVmawb3B176vvzkZUdUgxDyst9Z1yZSNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.SHIPPING: $10 USD IF YOUR IN THE USA! IF OUTSIDE THE USA I WILL SHIP TO MINERJONES AND HE CAN RESHIP TO YOUR COUNTRY FEES WILL VARY DEPENDING ON LOCATION

comments.body: They do have a liquid vibe to them‚Ä¶ some misfits in it to. I dig it.Edit: hahaha silly me, I just read the description and it is the misfit ghost.

comments.author: MrMojoRising26
comments.body: Quote from: BTCOVERFIATS on October 03, 2023, 01:27:22 AMThese are sick. These coins remind me of the Squirrelbits style in a way. Great work.Lot 4: 0.004 BTC The hardest form of money on earthLiquid is the man as far as I am concerned¬† I have a nice squirrelbits collection I am a big fan of his work! I don't think I would even be messing with a laser if not for him. He is the first to make cool double sided designed coins that were large, and the first to have off centered holos, his quotes, the not giving a shit what people think attitude and so on... he deserves a lot of credit for being innovative! His use of different metals, and his manufacturing process is next level the list goes on ..¬† I am certainly influenced by his greatness no doubt.
